summary:
La Liga is Spain's premier football league, featuring 20 teams playing 38 matches each season. It's officially named LaLiga EA Sports due to sponsorship. Real Madrid holds the record for most titles (36), with Barcelona close behind. The league has seen dominance from various clubs over different decades.

La Liga is highly regarded in Europe, often ranking as the top league. It has produced many successful clubs and players, winning numerous international awards and titles. The league is popular worldwide, with high attendance and revenue, attracting fans and top players.
title: La Liga
